name: Chemical Engineering
description: The Chemical Engineering Department has completed hundred years of glorious journey in 2021. With the mentorship of an eminent scholar, Acharya P.C. Roy, and under the academic leadership of Prof. H. L. Roy and Prof. Baneswar Das, Chemical Engineering Education India has been introduced by this department. Being a part of the then Bengal Technical Institute, the predecessor of Jadavpur University, a structured Chemical Engineering course was offered for the first time in India by this department. This department is also one of the oldest departments in Chemical Engineering in the World. The department commemorated Diamond Jubilee in 1982 and Platinum Jubilee in 1996.
